title: Lauf Seigla Gravel Bike adds Race Transmission T-Type build
content:
Lauf’s race-ready Seigla gravel bike launched in April 2022 with a sleeker, leaner, and more capable frame than their original True Grit. Then they dropped the prices across the board as their US HQ started handling all shipping and they fully committed to a consumer-direct model.

Now, they’ve added a Seigla Race Transmission build option, pairing SRAM XO T-Type derailleur, cassette, and chain with Force AXS shifters, cranks, and brakes.

The frame also comes in a gorgeous new satin Moss Green, and the rest of the build includes their flared Smoothie handlebar, FSA SL-K carbon seatpost, e-Thirteen XCX Race Carbon wheels, FSA stem & headset, and Fizik Aliante R5 saddle.

Claimed weight for the size Medium bike is 19.06lb (8.65kg). MSRP is just $4,790.
